Name: Rattler II

The Rattler is a cost-effective cluster missile that will no doubt appeal to a wide variety of pilots. When fired, the Rattler will track the opponentâ€™s IR signature and create an opening barrage that weakens the armor or shields, leaving the target vulnerable to the full payload that follows.
